markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Nalinivati (The Serpent's Kiss)](/Deities.aspx?ID=181)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Tian Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=16)

**Edicts** Seek out magic and use it, use poison, heal poisons, bear or adopt children, raise snakes

**Anathema** Kill a harmless snake or swan, spurn friends due to jealousy or romantic competition, betray your offspring, separate lovers

**Follower Alignments**
LN, NG, N, NE

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Wisdom or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2)

**Favored Weapon** [jaws](/Weapons.aspx?ID=1) or [Urumi](/Weapons.aspx?ID=306)

**Domains** [Glyph](/Domains.aspx?ID=46), [Magic](/Domains.aspx?ID=19), [Passion](/Domains.aspx?ID=25), [Wyrmkin](/Domains.aspx?ID=57)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Charm](/Spells.aspx?ID=34)

- **2nd**
[Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=164)

- **3rd**
[Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172)

- **4th**
[Reflective Scales](/Spells.aspx?ID=583)

- **5th**
[Subconscious Suggestion](/Spells.aspx?ID=314)

- **6th**
[Mislead](/Spells.aspx?ID=199)

- **7th**
[Contingency](/Spells.aspx?ID=49)

- **8th**
[Scintillating Pattern](/Spells.aspx?ID=267)

- **9th**
[Storm of Vengeance](/Spells.aspx?ID=313)

</column>
name: Nalinivati (The Serpent's Kiss)
